${model_information}
c Cell Card
1 1 -${fuel_rho} -1 imp:n=1 
2 2 -1.7 -2 1       imp:n=1
99 0              2 imp:n=0 
 
c Surface Card
1 rcc 0 0 0 0 0 ${core_z} ${r_core}
2 rcc 0 0 -${refl_t} 0 0 ${refl_z} ${r_refl}

c Data Card
c

c
${fuel_string}
mt1 grph.20t
c
c name: Carbon, Graphite (reactor grade)
c density = 1.7
m2
     5010 -1.8431e-07
     5011 -8.1569e-07
     6012 -9.8841e-01
     6013 -1.1584e-02
mt2 grph.20t
c
